item.title: Eisenhower Matrix
item.description: Eisenhower Matrix üóíÔ∏è Description The Eisenhower Matrix is a great tool for organizing your tasks and helping you prioritize. It encourages you to focus on the most important things first, and it helps you break down large tasks into smaller, more manageable chunks.

item.title: Pareto
item.description: Pareto üóíÔ∏è Description Pareto is a principle that states that 80% of outcomes come from 20% of the efforts. It’s commonly used in business to indicate that most results are generated by a small portion of work.
